info.name: Google+ Space
info.description:
Google+ Space: 
CSS for Google Plus - less empty space, less additional information,
smaller sidebars - easyer to read
info.additionalInfo:
Google Plus has changed it's CSS code, so lots of changes aren't available now. Please wait while i'll refix it.

v.1.4. New Name
For 1024px screen
- Additional words in russain
- Names hide
- Date hide
- less paddings
- smaller sidebar
- less additional elements
- more space
- comments hidden (till clicked)
- focus on text

TODO List
- For any screen size
- Left Panel edit
